divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside in the driveway talking and I was looking up at the neighbor's roof line. I noticed two yellow-orange lights that seemed to be too low for a plane. Then one disappeared and then the other. It was quick, but seemed like it was slow-motion when I was watching it. They just floated there and there was no sounds. After they were gone, I told my fiance about it (he has seen them once in May) and he said "See now you know what we were talking about" I have two other friends that have seen these lights as well. It was the strangest thing.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around June 20th 2006
Summary: Two yellow-orange lights in eastern sky and then disappeared
